front.title: YANG Data Model for SFC Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM)

abstract.t: This draft defines YANG data model for SFC OAM. It extends from the basic YANG data model for Layer independent OAM Management defined in [I-D.tissa-lime-yang-oam-model] and [I-D.wang-lime-rpc-yang-oam- management] with SFC technology specifics. It includes SFC OAM related configuration, state, and RPC information data.
